items.title: Rams rally past Panthers to open NFL playoffs, advance to divisional round
items.summary: All-Pros Matthew Stafford and Puka Nacua helped the Los Angeles Rams advance to the NFC divisional round.  Stafford threw a 19-yard touchdown pass to Colby Parkinson in the final minute and the Rams rallied to beat the Carolina Panthers 34-31, kicking off the NFL playoffs on Saturday with a game that was much closer than expected.

items.title: Stafford‚Äôs late TD pass to Parkinson lifts the Rams past the Panthers 34-31 in the wild-card round
items.summary: Matthew Stafford threw a 19-yard go-ahead touchdown pass to Colby Parkinson with 38 seconds to lift the Los Angeles Rams to a dramatic 34-31 wild-card round win over the Carolina Panthers in the opening game of the NFL playoffs on Saturday.

items.title: Pittsburgh Steelers make major Aaron Rodgers decision before playoffs
items.summary: It remains to be seen what the future holds for Aaron Rodgers, 42, who signed just a one-year deal with the Pittsburgh Steelers last offseason.  Rodgers could decide to call it a career after Pittsburgh‚Äôs postseason run, as retirement is something that he‚Äôs pondered in recent years.  NFL insider Ian Rapoport confirmed as much during a recent television appearance.
